name: Nelson
heroTitle: Hi, I'm Nelson, I design+code websites

projects.title: AHSI
projects.subTitle: Social media app
projects.desc: AHSI is a fully featured social media web app. People can create an account, post stuff, search for and follow other people, like and comment posts.

projects.title: BooChat
projects.subTitle: Real-time chat app

projects.title: OpWear
projects.subTitle: E-commerce website
projects.desc: OpWear is an e-commerce store for a high-end clothing store. Shop through collections and navigate to product pages, add products to cart and proceed to checkout.

about: Since I was little, I've had a passion for building things and learning something new along the way. I eventually settled on programming. I also love mountains and good design.
